alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 23 at 4:30AM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains, Shirley Basin, Central Carbon County and North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin
